raw_body: MENDIS – OLGA – Safe in the Arms of Jesus. (Retired Registrar of Marriage – Negombo),​ beloved wife of the late Patrick Mendis,​ precious mother of Charmaine,​ Diana (UK),​ Prosper (SriLankan Airlines),​ loving mother-in-law of Freddy,​ late Joe and Chrishani (Rupavahini),​ precious nana of Jonathan,​ Melanie & Joshua (UK),​ Enon & Sanduni,​ Michelle,​ Shawn,​ Shenelle and Dion,​ loving great grandmother of Lilah (UK),​ beloved sister of the late Damian Perera & Freacy Fernando,​ sister-in-law of the late Aelian Mendis and late Panteleon Fernando. Burial at General Cemetery,​ Negombo on Friday,​ 5th January at 4 p.m. Cortege leaves Western Florists,​ Negombo.001019
